name: fakoli-plugins
description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins for enhanced productivity and development workflows

categories.name: Productivity
categories.description: Tools to enhance your development workflow and efficiency

categories.name: Code Quality
categories.description: Linting, testing, and code review plugins

plugins.name: rust-network-module
plugins.description: Scaffold new Rust async networking modules with Tokio, tracing, and anyhow following established project patterns

plugins.name: marketplace-manager
plugins.description: Manage the fakoli-plugins marketplace: add/remove plugins, validate manifests, and regenerate registry indices

plugins.name: nano-banana-pro
plugins.description: Generate, edit, remix, and optimize images using Google's Gemini 3 Pro Image Preview model

plugins.name: k8s-sidecar-testing
plugins.description: End-to-end testing workflow for nat464-sidecar in IPv6-only Kubernetes clusters using Multipass VMs and k3s
